result.summary: Redesigned task components to match the HTML design examples exactly. TaskCard now features a white card with indigo icon box, frequency badges (emerald/blue/amber based on daily/weekly/monthly), format badge, info rows (Output/Path/Limit), hover-visible edit/delete buttons, and Run Task/Test action buttons using Material Icons. TaskForm now has sectioned layout with BASIC INFO (indigo icon), OUTPUT SETTINGS (green icon), and TESTING & DEBUGGING (blue background section with science icon), plus Delete Task link in footer. TaskList uses the specified grid layout (grid-cols-1 xl:grid-cols-2 gap-6). Modal footer was updated to support full-width layouts. TasksPage now passes onDelete to TaskForm for in-modal task deletion.

TaskForm now has sectioned layout with BASIC INFO (indigo icon), OUTPUT SETTINGS (green icon), and TESTING & DEBUGGING (blue background section with science icon), plus Delete Task link in footer. TaskList uses the specified grid layout (grid-cols-1 xl:grid-cols-2 gap-6). Modal footer was updated to support full-width layouts.
